trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl" /> class is used to pass the security identifier (SID) of a security principle to retrieve quota-related data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl" /> 類別 (Class) 用於傳遞安全性原則的安全性識別項 (SID)，以擷取與配額相關的資料。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl.#ctor" /> 建構函式會建立 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl.#ctor" /> 建構函式會建立 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The SID of the security principle.

The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl.#ctor(System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl" /> class using the specified SID.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl.#ctor(System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier)" /> 建構函式使用指定的 SID，建立 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl.GetValue" /> method returns the SID associated with this query.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl.GetValue" /> 方法會傳回與這個查詢關聯的 SID。

trans-unit.source: The SID associated with this query.
trans-unit.target: 與這個查詢關聯的 SID。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl.QuerySid" /> property contains the SID of the security principle.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl.QuerySid" /> 屬性包含安全性原則的 SID。

trans-unit.source: The SID of the security principle.
